title: The Mysterians
creator_credit: RKO Teleradio Pictures, Carlos Montalban, Peter Riethof, Tomoyuki Tanaka and Ishiro Honda
brief_description: Homeless aliens from a ruined planet decide to make Earth their new home in this Japanese horror outing. Soon after the mysterious brainiacs, who arrive in giant flying saucers accompanied by an enormous death-ray spewing robotic bird, establish themselves in a special dome, they demand that the Earth men bring them lots of pretty women so they can start replenishing their depleted population. Special effects by Eiji Tsuburaya.
